name: ANITA
description: ANITA is a memecoin on ink – Kraken’s powerful Layer 2 blockchain. She teaches with passion, engages and vibes with the community, spreads valuable knowledge, and actively helps onboard newcomers into the Web3 world. With the army, she brings energy, laughter, and inspiration, fostering growth, creativity, and collaboration. Her mission is to empower users, strengthen connections, and help build a thriving, inclusive, and unstoppable Web3 family for the future.
